sentences.en: Among his entourage was a retired general.
sentences.cn: 他的随行人员中有一位退休的将军.

sentences.en: And he is as a relative liberal within Mr Putin's entourage.
sentences.cn: 在普京的随从中,他认为是比较自由的.

sentences.en: As for Zhou Haibin entourage, and he opened a room of people who do not know.
sentences.cn: 至于随行人员周海滨, 他和哪位人士共开一间房就不得而知了.

sentences.en: At last , Cao Zhi and his entourage reluctantly mount their horses andand slowly drive away.
sentences.cn: 曹植及随行人员站在渡河的楼船上凝目远送,天各一方,最后不得不乘车缓缓离去.

sentences.en: Eisenhower introduced his entourage to the Pope.
sentences.cn: 艾森豪威尔向教皇介绍了自己的随行人员.

sentences.en: He was accompanied by an entourage of a dozen police officers.
Her entourage consisted of several squires and maids.
sentences.cn: 她的随行人由几个护卫和侍女构成.

sentences.en: Hometown entourage to Beijing, after Britain, France, Japan and other foreign language.
sentences.cn: 随从家乡到北京后,英 、 法 、 日等外国语言.

sentences.en: I do not want to be one of the swines in your entourage.
sentences.cn: 我不想与您的随员中那些卑劣的家伙们为伍.

sentences.en: ON PALM SUNDAY 2002 George Bush and his entourage were flying home from El Salvador.
sentences.cn: 2002年的棕枝全日,乔治.布什与随行人员正坐在从萨尔瓦多飞往首都华盛顿的飞机上.

sentences.en: Peter the Great shocked London by his wild behaviour and that of his entourage when he visited England in 1698.
sentences.cn: 彼得大帝及其随从1698年踏足英格兰时的野蛮行为震惊了伦敦。

sentences.en: Please tune in to HBO for the latest episode of Entourage.
sentences.cn: 敬请收看HBO最新一集的《我家也有大明星》.

sentences.en: Red watches as Norton storms up with an entourage of guards.
sentences.cn: 瑞德看到诺顿带着一队随从怒气冲天的走上来.

sentences.en: The entourage is the same , the rhythm is the same.
sentences.cn: 周围的一切还是那样, 节奏也一样.

sentences.en: The entourage that is in here is going to remain.
sentences.cn: 在这里的随扈人员将会继续留下.

trans.tran_en: a group of people who travel with an important person
